ch0132_00_adeku/0101_0701_01_10:
Even the longest journey begins with the first step!
It’s great to see that your adventurous spirit is as
strong as ever!
ch0132_00_adeku/0101_0701_02_10:
We must continue to aim even higher than
before, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
ch0132_00_adeku/0601_0701_01_10:
Different people have different ideas about how
we should coexist with Pokémon.
ch0132_00_adeku/0601_0701_02_10:
I’ve met a lot of people with different opinions...
Some want Pokémon to be powerful, while others
hope to free them from humans.
ch0132_00_adeku/0601_0701_03_10:
I was especially impressed by one young Trainer
I met who believed that the bonds of love and
friendship are what make you strong!
ch0132_00_adeku/0601_0701_04_10:
You remind me a lot of that Trainer! That’s why
I have great expectations of you!
ch0132_00_adeku/0602_0701_01_10:
Trainers spend each day trying to take the title
of Champion in order to prove that they’re
the strongest!
ch0132_00_adeku/0602_0701_02_10:
However, you mustn’t think of that as your end
goal. It’s merely a point that you must reach on
your way to even greater heights!
ch0132_00_adeku/0602_0701_03_10:
The Champion’s job is to protect the happiness of 
people and Pokémon alike!
ch0132_00_adeku/0602_0701_04_10:
To travel with Pokémon is to embark on a vast,
never-ending journey! I still have much to learn
about the world myself!
ch0132_00_adeku/0602_0701_05_10:
I am one with my partner Pokémon! I hope he and
I can continue to help each other grow.
ch0132_00_adeku/0603_0701_01_10:
I must say, the Unova Pokémon League has
changed quite a bit since Iris was crowned
the Champion!
ch0132_00_adeku/0603_0701_02_10:
Compared to when I held the title, the Champion’s
chamber has a much grander, livelier atmosphere
now—quite befitting Iris herself!
ch0132_00_adeku/0603_0701_03_10:
And I’m not talking about the decorative changes
she made! Her battle style is innovative and
exciting and yet different from my own!
ch0132_00_adeku/0604_0701_01_10:
Feet are the starting point of any adventure!
Walk your way through this world on your own
two feet! That’s where it all begins!
ch0132_00_adeku/0604_0701_02_10:
Back when I was traveling, I often camped out
with my Pokémon when we got tired of walking!
ch0132_00_adeku/0604_0701_03_10:
It was exhausting, especially when things got
tough. But in those moments, my Pokémon were
the ones who pulled us through!
ch0132_00_adeku/0605_0701_01_10:
I have a few Trainers that I’ve taken under my
wing as disciples, so to speak...
ch0132_00_adeku/0605_0701_02_10:
Some of them worked extremely hard and became
members of the Elite Four.
ch0132_00_adeku/0605_0701_03_10:
You actually resemble them in many
ways, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
ch0132_00_adeku/0605_0701_04_10:
Nothing makes me happier than bringing out the
full potential of a young Trainer!
ch0132_00_adeku/0605_0701_05_10:
If there’s anything you can learn from me, don’t
hesitate to ask me for help!
ch0132_00_adeku/1701_0701_01_10:
This is just something small, but I’d like you to
have it! Go ahead—take it!
ch0132_00_adeku/1701_0701_02_10: I hope it helps you on your journey!
ch0132_00_adeku/1701_0702_01_10:
No need to hold back. Just think of it as a little
extra encouragement from me!
ch0132_00_adeku/2501_0701_01_10:
My very first partner Pokémon was laid to rest at
the Celestial Tower in Unova.
ch0132_00_adeku/2501_0701_02_10:
They taught me the importance of life. How fragile
it can be... That nothing endures forever.
ch0132_00_adeku/2501_0701_03_10:
I was very sad to say good-bye to my partner.
But that’s how I was able to realize the joy of
being with Pokémon.
ch0132_00_adeku/2501_0701_04_10:
I hope you are treasuring the time you spend
with your Pokémon!
ch0132_00_adeku/2501_0702_02_10:
I hope I’m living my life in a way that would
make my old partner proud.
ch0132_00_adeku/2511_0701_01_10:
Just as a master teaches their disciple, there are
also things that a disciple can teach their master.
ch0132_00_adeku/2511_0701_02_10:
Such is the nature of masters and disciples. They
must also trust each other, or the relationship will
not serve its purpose.
ch0132_00_adeku/2511_0701_03_10:
There are many things that I learned only when I
started teaching others...
ch0132_00_adeku/2511_0701_04_10:
I never knew that I could get so passionate about
helping others grow!
ch0132_00_adeku/2511_0702_01_10:
I feel that you and your partner have 
unlimited potential!
ch0132_00_adeku/2511_0702_02_10:
I want to learn more about your approach—and
of course, I’d be happy to teach you what I know!
ch0132_00_adeku/2511_0702_03_10:
I’m looking forward to seeing you reach your
full potential!
ch0132_00_adeku/3001_0701_01_10:
Morning is the best time to meditate. Take deep
breaths and relax both your body and spirit.
ch0132_00_adeku/3003_0701_01_10:
I’m not one to just sit around. I’m heading out
to train with my Pokémon!
ch0132_00_adeku/3005_0701_01_10:
Your Pokémon worked hard for you today.
Make sure you treat it right.
